title: Tuna Salad
tagline: Classic lunch, perfectly balanced. Not too dry, not too wet.
description: Classic lunch, perfectly balanced. Not too dry, not too wet.
steps: Drain tuna well and flake into a bowl.
Add mayo, mustard, celery, onion, and lemon juice.
Mix gently—don't mash the tuna to paste.
Serve on bread, crackers, or over greens.
notes: Good tuna matters: Try olive oil-packed for richer flavor.
Drain well: Wet tuna = watery salad.
Variations: Add chopped pickle, fresh dill, or a pinch of curry powder.
